website_summaries.verdict: Worth a look if you have a sensitive small to mid-sized dog and want to save a few dollars.
pros: An automatic controller with updated tech
Can be used indoors and outdoors
Has three levels for different training purposes
Only requires one 9V battery, and can get up to six months of operation
Has a range as far as 50 feet
cons: Not likely to work for all dogs
Some customers with large breeds gripe that it made no difference
Unit is harder to conceal than other automatic models

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product by the favorable scores and comments. However, practically it’s doesn’t really work for me. I have 4 dogs that HATE squirrels (and goat, long story)! I purchased this item in the hopes it would help me train them, it hasn’t even slowed them down. I’ve had to change the 9v battery twice and that’s a nuisance in and of it’s self. You have to unscrew a TINY phillips head screw (used a eyeglass screw driver) and if you have nails it adds a new level of “COME ON, REALLY”!!! Suffice it to say very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for my two shih-tzu puppies
customer_reviews.text: I have two puppies, shih-tzu and havanese mixes, and even though they are brothers, I swear one is the spawn of Satan himself. He barks constantly, so much even his own brother doesn't want to be around him. I need something to help train him, anything, and I really hoped this would work. But alas, it was like it wasn't even there. Even on the highest setting, it didn't even phase him. The light would blink, but neither dog would even look at it. I will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Myers

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I Purchased an expensive version of a barking device that works great, however I have almost an acre yard, I needed a second device for the side yard. I thought I would try an inexpensive version from Amazon. It just does not work at all, I’ve tried multiple locations etc. don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: terrifying
customer_reviews.text: My dog became extremely frightened when I turned this on. No loud noises had occurred to set the device off -- maybe it's just super-sensitive to sounds, or maybe it's defective. I turned it off and also removed the battery. My dog remained very frightened for an hour or so after this and then fell into a deep sleep. When he woke up he was ok. Needless to say, I sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: martha l.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Had great reviews when I bought it, now the reviews and the product are both gone. Gee I wonder why. If I could give it no stars I would. The dogs just bark and it does nothing. Oh wait. It goes green. Even when I'm taking. But it does nothing to deter the barking noise. It might as well be a picture on a wall. Don't waste your money like I did. Amazon this thing sucks and was a waste of money and your shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed promising but died quickly
customer_reviews.text: This definitely emitted a noise that seemed to make my dogs and my neighbor's at least reconsider their barking, but it quickly died. There are more fun ways to waste your money that are at least as effective as a bark deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Helfst

customer_reviews.title: No battery life
customer_reviews.text: It works when the batteries are new, but the battery life is only about 2 days. 3, 9 volt batteries a week really add up, so it’s pretty well useless unless you want to pay that much to keep changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a little faulty from the moment I bought it. My dog barked right next to it and I tried to bring it up to the highest setting and still that didn’t make a difference. It also seemed to go off with things other than my dog barking.
customer_reviews.author: Jilliann Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work at all my puppy didn’t take any mind to this. I followed directions but no dice. I would not say this won’t work for any dog my other does notice the output and stays away from the machine but he doesn’t bark anyway
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kleist

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. I got it because my Aussies have separation anxiety and go nuts barking when I leave the house. Not only did this not even faze them, the battery died after using for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Califf

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Great little box to stop barking! But the battery doesn't last very long :-( There are different settings on it but unless you take the battery out, it will still drain the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Benni

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last even one week
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great with fresh batteries, but even in the off position the batteries are drained in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Older than some

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this anti bark device and was very disappointed. It is super small and cheaply made. Took me two trips to the store to get what's needed to make it work. Hint - just to open it you need a glasses screw driver and yes it's that little.
customer_reviews.author: David Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Increased barking
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. I didn’t feel like it worked. The dog barked constantly every time I turned it on. It was also slightly different than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: didnt work for us
customer_reviews.text: My puppy barks regardless of this product being on. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Works for a bit, then dogs get used to it.
customer_reviews.text: Uh, it worked great for a few days... the dogs weren’t sure what was going on. Every time they barked there was someone yelling at them. They learned to bark from a distance at first, then slowly began to ignore the ultrasonic voice altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Neighbors dog still barking. And I placed a few of these near the dividing wall.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste Edition

customer_reviews.title: Batteries last 4 days, 'off'
customer_reviews.text: Brand new battery added, turn this device on for 10 minutes, turn it off and don't touch it for less than a week, and the battery dies. Probably should update the model to use rechargeables if thats how this is supposed to work
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Whitehair

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work Most of the time, unless is just using up batteries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Simply didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Have 4 dogs. This device did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: No effect
customer_reviews.text: No effect at all on any of our 3 large dogs. They don’t even pretend to hear anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this item no starts I would. My dog barks directly at it. It does nothing but use up batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did not reconize this bark box. I had to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm looking for something else.
customer_reviews.text: It's dosen't work for a rat terrier or chi . Barking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, doesn’t perform as it claims it does
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Barking Dogs
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Wished we had purchased it years ago
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I have tried everything and can not get it to light or test beep.
customer_reviews.author: CLD

product_meta.title: Lambow Anti Barking Device, Ultrasonic Dog Bark Control Sonic Bark Deterrents Silencer Stop Barking Bark Stop Repeller
product_meta.description:
Uses ultrasonic technology to stop barks, recommended level for indoor use is level 1 if need.
Four adjustable ultrasonic volume levels - test, low, medium, and high, with LED battery power level indicator.
The device uses low-intensity ultrasonic, is silent to humans and not harmful. Safe for small, medium, large dogs.


HOW IT WORKS 
This device is automatically activated by the sound of barking. When the device is within the range of a barking dog, the microphone will isolate and pick up the barking to emit an ultrasonic sound to silence the dog.


HOW TO TEST IT
①Adjust the knob to "TEST" button
②Place the item to a position which is one arm's length away from you
③Whistle to the microphone of the item loudly,if the LED blinks Green,and you can hear beeping noise,then the item work properly


Package Includes:
1 X New Outdoor Bark Control
1 X User manual


Guarantee：
The offers a 100% Satisfaction experience! Any reason our product doesn't meet your standards, just send it back our way for a replacement or a full refund!
